tool_description: Provides information about regions, cities, and districts for various countries.

api_list.name: Get districts
api_list.description: Fetches districts by providing the country code, region code, and city number. The country code can be obtained from the Get Countries endpoint, the region code from the Get Regions endpoint, and the city number from the Get Cities endpoint.

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The two-letter code representing the country.

api_list.name: Get cities
api_list.description: Fetches cities by providing the country code and region code. The country code can be obtained from the Get Countries endpoint, and the region code from the Get Regions endpoint.

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The two-letter code representing the country.

api_list.name: Get region details
api_list.description: Fetches details of a specific region by providing the country code and region code.

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The two-letter code representing the country.

api_list.name: Get regions
api_list.description: Fetches all regions for a specified country. The country code can be obtained from the Get Countries endpoint.

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The two-letter code representing the country.

api_list.name: Get country details
api_list.description: Fetches details of a specific country by providing the country code (2-letter code).

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The two-letter code representing the country.

api_list.name: Get all countries
api_list.description: Fetches a list of all supported countries.

api_list.name: Health Check
api_list.description: Provides a way to test connectivity to the API.
